(Simplified: 痨)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 勞 indicates the sound; 疒 (sickness) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 疒 [ nè ] sickness, disease
    • 勞 [ láo ] to labor, to toil; to do manual work
①中醫指積勞損削之病：五癆(五臟勞損，“心勞”、“肝勞”、“肺勞”、“脾勞”、“腎勞”的總稱)。
②結核病的俗稱：肺癆。骨癆。
癆病 [ láo bìng ]: tuberculosis (TCM)
(Simplified: 痨)

Original meaning 本义: Meaning consumption or tuberculosis.

癆字的基本解释

láo
见“痨”。

癆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［láo］
［《集韻》郎刀切，平，來。］
“痨1”的繁体字。
(1)结核病的俗称。多指肺结核。
(2)积劳损削之病。

癆字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　癆； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页780第32
【唐韻】【集韻】?郎到切，勞去聲。【說文】朝鮮謂藥毒曰癆。【廣韻】癆痢惡人。【揚子·方言】凡飲藥傅藥而毒，北燕朝鮮之閒謂之癆。【註】癆痢，皆辛螫也。　又【博雅】痛也。　又【集韻】憐蕭切，音聊。又郎刀切，音勞。義?同。　又【正字通】今人以積勞?削爲癆病。

(2) The disease of accumulated strain.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　痨; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 780 32
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] Lang to cut, please go. [Said the text] North Korea called the drug to be called tuberculosis. [Guang Yun] The wicked of tuberculosis and dysentery. [Yangtze Dialect] Everyone who drinks medicine and poisons it is called tuberculosis in North Korea. [Note] Tuberculosis and dysentery are all pungent.　[Bo Ya] It hurts too.　[Jiyun] Pity and sorrow, voice chat. Another Lang knife cut, Yin Lao. Righteous? Same.　[Zhengzitong] Nowadays people use accumulated labor to cut tuberculosis.
